alert.note: Alert for Craig; Mayes; Nowata; Rogers (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 2:54PM CDT until May 05 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Craig County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northeastern Rogers County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Mayes County in northeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Nowata County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 254 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northeast of Foyil, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations in or near the path include... Vinita... Chelsea... Welch... Foyil... Bluejacket... New Alluwe... White Oak... Hollow... Pyramid Corners... Bushyhead... Centralia... Centrailia... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 264 and 265. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
